SYN_BRONCH_5_7:
[Indication]
CF patient, RLL cavitary lesion.

[Anesthesia]
General.

[Description]
1. Inspection: RLL superior segment purulence.
2. BAL: 60cc instilled, 20cc return.
3. Findings: Cavity with mycetoma visualized.
4. Biopsy: Forceps biopsies of mass.
5. Complication: Moderate bleeding controlled with epi/ice/wedge.

[Plan]
CXR. Cultures pending.
